verses.text: \w Behold|strong="G1492"\w*, what manner \w of|strong="G4217"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* hath \w bestowed|strong="G1325"\w* upon \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we should be \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the \w sons|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w therefore|strong="G1223"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* it \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w Beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* are \w we|strong="G2070"\w* the \w sons|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w doth|strong="G5319"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w appear|strong="G5319"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* we shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w when|strong="G1437"\w* he shall \w appear|strong="G5319"\w*, we shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* we shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* every \w man|strong="G3956"\w* that \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w purifieth|strong="G0048"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w pure|strong="G0053"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w committeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w transgresseth|strong="G4160"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w law|strong="G0458"\w*: \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the transgression of the \w law|strong="G0458"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* was \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* take \w away|strong="G0142"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w* \w hath|strong="G3708"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

Little \w children|strong="G5040"\w*, \w let|strong="G4105"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w deceive|strong="G4105"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: he that \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*.

He that \w committeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w*. \w For|strong="G1519"\w* this \w purpose|strong="G5124"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* was \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w destroy|strong="G3089"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* is \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w doth|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G4160"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w remaineth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w sin|strong="G0264"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he is \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*: \w whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w message|strong="G0031"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we should \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Cain|strong="G2535"\w*, \add who\add* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* that wicked \w one|strong="G4190"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w slew|strong="G4969"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w wherefore|strong="G5484"\w* slew \w he|strong="G4969"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*? \w Because|strong="G3754"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother’s|strong="G0080"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*.

\w Marvel|strong="G2296"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w hate|strong="G3404"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we have \w passed|strong="G3327"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* we \w love|strong="G0025"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*. He that \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \add his\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w hateth|strong="G3404"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w murderer|strong="G0443"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w murderer|strong="G0443"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w abiding|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Hereby|strong="G1722"\w* perceive \w we|strong="G1097"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \add  \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*\add*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* laid \w down|strong="G5087"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* to lay \w down|strong="G5087"\w* \add our\add* \w lives|strong="G5590"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w whoso|strong="G3739"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* this \w world’s|strong="G2889"\w* \w good|strong="G0979"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeth|strong="G2334"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shutteth \w up|strong="G2808"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bowels|strong="G4698"\w* \add of compassion\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G3306"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w My|strong="G3450"\w* little \w children|strong="G5040"\w*, let \w us|strong="G0025"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* in \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* in \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* in \w deed|strong="G2041"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w hereby|strong="G1722"\w* we \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w assure|strong="G3982"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* condemn \w us|strong="G2607"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* greater \w than|strong="G3187"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w condemn|strong="G2607"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \add then\add* have \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3739"\w* we \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*, we \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* we \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* those things that are \w pleasing|strong="G0701"\w* \w in|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, \w That|strong="G2443"\w* we should \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* on the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w keepeth|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w hereby|strong="G1722"\w* we \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.
